value.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage changes to your repository source by using pull requests.

value.title: Manage release cadence in Azure Pipelines by using deployment patterns
value.excerpt: Choose and implement a deployment pattern that helps you smoothly roll out new application features to your users.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

value.title: Manage site reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Settle competing commits by using merge conflict resolution on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to settle overlapping commits across branches by using merge conflict resolution.

value.title: Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Cloud Adoption Framework to develop best practices for cloud adoption in real-world scenarios.

value.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: Recognize and synthesize speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to recognize and synthesize speech by using Azure Cognitive Services.

value.title: Route system feedback to development teams
value.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

value.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Stop hackers from getting into your Windows and Linux servers. In this module, you’ll discover how to protect VMs and servers with Azure Security Center

value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Best way to start Power Apps for a non-professional developer? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Sometimes services like Power Apps can be daunting. In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar shares some tips for getting started and explains why you do not have to be a professional developer to use Power Apps.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/modules/get-started-with-powerapps/?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-donasa
